title: Veeravalli College of Law, Rajahmundhry - Admissions, Contact, Website, Facilities 2025-2026
meta_description: Veeravalli College of Law, Rajahmundhry, Andhra Pradesh Application Form, Admissions, Contact, Website, Map, L.L.B, BA + L.L.B, L.L.M . 3 Courses. Average Fees is 15000 per year.

basic_info.name: Veeravalli College of Law, Rajahmundry,founded in 1995 is affiliated to Andhra University. This is regarded as one of the best colleges for law across the country. It would be wise decision for young aspirants of law to apply for the college. All the courses have been approved by Bar Council of India (BAR). The institution aims to offer high-class learning to the students by means of good infrastructural facilities mainly auditoriums, libraries and classrooms. With an aim to build a sense of responsibility and realize their role towards society, it stands out to be a unique law college in India.
Facts and Figures of Veeravalli College of Law
Why to Join Veeravalli College of Law?
Faculty Members- The institute has well qualified and highly experienced staff members.
Awards and Scholarships for seditious students- The management is highly generous to award scholarship and medals to all the meritorious and poor students.
Excellent Placements– The presence of a placement cell helps all the students to excel in campus placements by conducting several practice session or trainings and campus interviews.
